text: @SecPompeo @khamenei_ir China and Japan are saying the coronavirus (not Wuhan virus) came from the US! You claim to be world leader (lol) but don't have enough RNA extraction kits and virus detection kits. Your officials say 1% of the US population is affected by the virus. So SHUT UP
